Reviews.Title: terrible camera and waste of money
Reviews.Author: Optimistic
Reviews.Content: - I will not recommend this camera to anyone- my Galaxy note-2 camera shoots photos better than this camera- the flash doesn't work automatically and even if i opened it it doesn't flash- photo quality in low light is extremely terrible- i don't see any reason why one upgrading from point and shoot to select this camera- I should have chosen a good DSLR or other models of NEX like the 6 or the 7 instead. I wasted my money for this crap.
